channel.title: Steam Explodes as Word Acts Weird and Windows Takes "Caution."
channel.description: A day or two ago, when I turned on my computer, it started to open up all the contents of the Steam folder. It's ANNOYING. Anyone know how to fix this? As soon as I delete all of this in the Startup folder, they add themselves again. And Steam keeps forgetting my username and password. I have no idea how to fix it. Can anyone help? ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.title: Steam Explodes as Word Acts Weird and Windows Takes "Caution."
item.dc:creator: SoaringScout
item.description:
I THOUGHT I fixed the problem. Then it happened AGAIN.

Read full topic

I just don’t get some people.

I feel like an idiot. Just close the thread, admins :fffuuu:

item.title: Steam Explodes as Word Acts Weird and Windows Takes "Caution."
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Quickly shut down the computer that has the problem, disconnect any wires from computer, dig a hole in your back yard, place the computer in the hole, cover with dirt and peat moss and never think about your computer again.

Read full topic
item.source: Steam Explodes as Word Acts Weird and Windows Takes "Caution."

item.title: Steam Explodes as Word Acts Weird and Windows Takes "Caution."
item.dc:creator: SoaringScout
item.description:
A day or two ago, when I turned on my computer, it started to open up all the contents of the Steam folder. It’s ANNOYING. Anyone know how to fix this? As soon as I delete all of this in the Startup folder, they add themselves again. And Steam keeps forgetting my username and password. I have no idea how to fix it. Can anyone help?

Read full topic
item.source: Steam Explodes as Word Acts Weird and Windows Takes "Caution."
